name: Garchomp LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Dragon Pulse
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Garchomp LV.X from your hand onto your Active Garchomp, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Restore
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a Pokémon (excluding Pokémon LV.X) and put it onto your Bench as a Basic Pokémon. Then, you may search your discard pile for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to that Pokémon.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Garchomp. Garchomp LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
